message.body: (1/2) The 2nd story metal roof at my place is leaking into the room beneath it. I was wondering if you might be able to take a look, or if you could suggest som
(2/2) eone who deals with that sort of thing?

Roof leaks are not my forte. I can take a look and slap some tar in a leak if it's evident where the leak is coming from but it is tricky to find the leak most of the time. I don't have a roofer that I would recommend
(1/2) The tenants say it seems to be leaking all along one seam. I'm thinking I may try to just put a tarp over it until the weather dries out in few days. Im j
Thanks for getting back to me regardless.
